data.actual_result: The previous emote previews stay for several seconds before switching
data.expected_result: Emote previews switch to the new emote choices that appear
data.short_description: Emote previews display as different emote when typing an emote (Works best with access to multiple emotes, for example through Nitro)
data.steps_to_repro: - Close out of Discord entirely - Open up Discord - Type the first part of several emotes (for example, "blob" or "meow" because of the amount of emotes with that in the name) - Wait for the emote previews to load in - After the previews load in, type one more letter - Observe the emote previews
